name: of the Devil
summary:
The year is 2086.
There's a camera in every device and a half dozen devices on every citizen. There are tracking implants in every cybernetic and location tags on every bullet. No stone goes unturned- and every stone is accounted for. Violent crimes are cleared in 97% of cases. The few cases that make it to trial result in a guilty verdict 98% of the time. People are safer now than at any other time in history, and getting away with murder is nearly impossible. So if you find yourself wrongly accused... Better have the right lawyer.
